channel.title: Adding Custom Yell?
channel.description: How would I add a custom yell? I uploaded the file where the yell command is. Please edit it and reupload it for me, or help in any other possible way. By custom yell I mean for one person. Not for donor and admin and mod.

item.title: Adding Custom Yell?
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

[quote=“Jacob_, post:16, topic:444248”]Not c.

I don’t have a Client class in my server, because it’s stupid. (Not the real reason, cbf to type it out.)

You could down cast to Client.

[tt]((Client) player).sendMessage(player.playerName + ranks[player.playerRights] + playerCommand.substring(5));[/tt][/quote]Okay thanks that seems to work

Read full topic

item.title: Adding Custom Yell?
item.dc:creator: @Jacob5 Jacob_
item.description:
@Jacob5 wrote:

Not c.

I don’t have a Client class in my server, because it’s stupid. (Not the real reason, cbf to type it out.)

You could down cast to Client.

[tt]((Client) player).sendMessage(player.playerName + ranks[player.playerRights] + playerCommand.substring(5));[/tt]

Read full topic

item.title: Adding Custom Yell?
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

[quote=“Jacob_, post:14, topic:444248”]Most commands that have some sort of, ‘other client’ method are over programmed.

Example:

for (int i = 0; i < PlayerHandler.players.length; i++) {
   if (PlayerHandler.players[i] != null) {
       Client c2 = (Client)PlayerHandler.players[i];
       // do whatever
   }
}

Could be changed to:

for (Player player : PlayerHandler.players) { // do whatever }

And, like 99% of all ‘send other’ message commands use more than one sendMessage instance. Like you did.[/quote]Nice alright but I tried your command you posted and it had this error.

src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:618: error: cannot find symbol player.getAction Sender().sendMessage(player.playerName + ranks[player.playerRights] + playerComm and.substring(5)); ^ symbol: method getActionSender() location: variable player of type Player Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 1 error Press any key to continue . . .

So I replaced this:

With this.

Got no error but when I try it I disconnect.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding Custom Yell?
item.dc:creator: @Jacob5 Jacob_
item.description:
@Jacob5 wrote:

Most commands that have some sort of, ‘other client’ method are over programmed.

Example:

for (int i = 0; i < PlayerHandler.players.length; i++) {
   if (PlayerHandler.players[i] != null) {
       Client c2 = (Client)PlayerHandler.players[i];
       // do whatever
   }
}

Could be changed to:

for (Player player : PlayerHandler.players) { // do whatever }

And, like 99% of all ‘send other’ message commands use more than one sendMessage instance. Like you did.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding Custom Yell?
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

[quote=“Onix, post:12, topic:444248”][quote author=mr extremez link=topic=546939.msg4009695#msg4009695 date=1339037318]

[quote author=Onix link=topic=546939.msg4009694#msg4009694 date=1339037100]

[quote author=mr extremez link=topic=546939.msg4009687#msg4009687 date=1339036362]
Wow nice jacob.
[/quote]It’s just a command, lol.
[/quote]Yeah but I always used that bullshit crappy yell in my project insanity server never knew you could reduce it that much lol
[/quote]Are all your commands like that? Over programmed. You should go through and re-write them like that. It will be good practice.[/quote]Yeah some are… But right now not working on a project. I’ll be sure to do that in the future though.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding Custom Yell?
item.dc:creator: @Jacob5 Jacob_
item.description:
@Jacob5 wrote:

Jeezus…

		if (playerCommand.startsWith("yell")) {
			final String[] ranks = { "[Player]", "[Mod]", "[Admin]" };
			for (Player player : PlayerHandler.players) {
				player.getActionSender().sendMessage(player.playerName + ranks[player.playerRights] + playerCommand.substring(5));
			}
		}

Can be done is SO many less lines!

Read full topic

item.title: Adding Custom Yell?
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

Good?

[code]if (playerCommand.startsWith(“yell”)) {
for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];
if (c.isDonator == 1 && (c.playerRights < 1 || c.playerRights > 3)){
c2.sendMessage("<shad=6081134>[Donator]<img=0>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
} else if (c.playerName.equals(“yourname”) {
c2.sendMessage("<col=255>[Custom Title]<img=1>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
} else if (c.playerRights == 1) {
c2.sendMessage("<col=255>[Mod]<img=1>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
} else if (c.playerRights == 2) {
c2.sendMessage("<col=255>[Admin]<img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
} else if (c.playerRights == 3) {
c2.sendMessage("<shad=15695415>[S3XY 0WN3RZ]<img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
} else if (c.playerRights == 0 && c.isDonator == 0) {
c.sendMessage(“You must be a medium donator or greater to use this command!”);

						}
					}
				}
			}
    
    
}[/code]

Read full topic
